bool.name: can_repair
bool.comment: This is true for the Loom research, in order for current health to adjust alongside the maximum health modifier.

float.name: ui_range_radius
float.comment: 10 is the setting for deep strike radius, if this number need to be changed, then deep strike radius needs to request programming support

list.name: hardpoints
list.comment: Hardpoint 28 is used by French for Red Palace Arbalest

group.name: hardpoint
group.comment: Unused. Keep as is to help line up garrison slots.
